channel.title: Auto Restarter
channel.description:
Ok so I Found this SR on these forums
""@echo off cls echo Voule Auto restarer taskkill /IM java.exe /f taskkill /IM javac.exe taskkill /IM javaw.exe echo Restarting servar title yourservername java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls""
I was wondering how long does it take before it restarts server, and is there anyway I could change that amount, and also add a clock too my server like a countdown clock.

item.title: Auto Restarter
item.dc:creator: @P00N3D_Y0U P00N3D_Y0U
item.description:
@P00N3D_Y0U wrote:

Ok so I Found this SR on these forums

“”@echo off
cls
echo Voule Auto restarer
taskkill /IM java.exe /f
taskkill /IM javac.exe
taskkill /IM javaw.exe
echo Restarting servar
title yourservername
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
cls""

I was wondering how long does it take before it restarts server, and is there anyway I could change that amount, and also add a clock too my server like a countdown clock.

Read full topic
